name: GimmeThat - Universal Shopping Wishlist
description: One wishlist. Thousands of stores. Millions of products. Meet GimmeThat, your universal shopping wishlist.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'none'; connect-src https://api.gimmethat.me/ https://events.gimmethat.me/ data: *; img-src 'self' data: https://api.gimmethat.me/ https://i-images.gimmethat.me/; font-src data:; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'sha256-uUH6VQHPmJlTdLWHfoVKfIJDsU8Z2ar3BXkTuwodx+Y=' 'sha256-zpHqFpU4u4qwb5JN7p7up8w0Z99Bxer82vSo4M3zbec=';
